A Contextual_position_in_building is the specification of the placement of an item, which is defined in its own coordinate space, in the coordinate space of a reference item.
Placement is specified as the transformation, applied to a representation of the shape of the placed item, that transforms the coordinates of the geometric entities of that representation into coordinates expressed in the coordinate system of a representation of the shape of the reference item.
